e: ￹`O~ `sowal~ `nira~ `i~, "`o~ `ta~`tayni~ `kako~" `saan~.￺He said he would come.￻他說：「我本來要來的」。
d.f: ￹￺a grammatical particle indicating a quotation mark marking the end of someone's words or thoughts￻文法上含概著許多自己意念的表達：一個句子的最後一個語氣的懇定

e: ￹`Ma~`herek~ `kako~ `a~ `mi~`licay~ `i~, `sowal~ `saan~ `cingra~￺When I finished asking, he responded by saying ...￻我問完他以後，他就說：「……」
d.f: ￹￺a grammatical particle indicating a sequence marker￻文法上含概著許多自己意念的表達：連接詞
